definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
consulate general/same as 總領事館|总领事馆[zong3 ling3 shi4 guan3]

sentences.english: The Chinese Embassy has already sent a working group to visit them.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐日使領館已經派工作組探望了有關漁民。

sentences.english: On March 11, Saudi Consulate in Karachi who have been attacked two grenades.
sentences.chinese: 本月11日，沙特駐卡拉奇領館曾遭兩枚手榴彈襲擊。

sentences.english: Currently, nearly one hundred Grade-A office buildings as well as a concentrated consulate district exist within this area.
sentences.chinese: 不僅有近百棟甲級寫字樓，還專設駐滬領館區。

sentences.english: Check with the U.S. embassy in your country to see whether other documentation is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 請向駐貴國的美國使領館詢問是否需要其他材料。

sentences.english: The choice of Wuhan as the site of the first new U.
sentences.chinese: 美國在武漢設立二十多年來第一個新領館有幾個原因。

sentences.english: Security has been noticeably increased in recent weeks at the city's airports and foreign consulates.
sentences.chinese: 近幾周來，上海的機場和外國領館區明顯增加了警力。

sentences.english: The pavilion, like our consulate, represents the spirit of US-China partnership.
sentences.chinese: 和領館一樣，美國館代表了美中夥伴關係的精神。

sentences.english: Consulate General of China in Kolkata encourage that.
sentences.chinese: 中國總領館對此表示支持和鼓勵。

sentences.english: I have been to Kolkata for about half a year. After I came here, I have visited 5 states, which fall under the jurisdiction of the Consulate General.
sentences.chinese: 我到任近半年，已訪問了總領館領區所有五邦。

sentences.english: He thanked for the Canadian government's strong support and help for the opening of the Chinese Consulate General in Montreal.
sentences.chinese: 感謝加政府對總領館開館提供的大力支持和協助。

sentences.english: National flags flew at half-mast in public places, at Chinese embassies and at consulates.
sentences.chinese: 全國和駐外使領館下半旗誌哀。

sentences.english: And also the supervisor, of course, at the post would do that.
sentences.chinese: 當然，使領館的上級官員也會這樣做。

sentences.english: Its main responsibility is to provide services for the Foreign Ministry and the Chinese diplomatic and consular missions overseas.
sentences.chinese: 主要擔負部機關及駐外使領館服務工作任務。

sentences.english: Our FCS China office supports these trade and tourism missions.
sentences.chinese: 美國駐華使領館商務處爲這些訪團提供支持。

sentences.english: A consular official will also take your picture and your fingerprints.
sentences.chinese: 領館工作人員還會獲取你的照片和指紋。

sentences.english: The wait is 30 days or less at fully 90 percent of U.S. embassies and consulates.
sentences.chinese: 等候時間低於30天的使領館至少佔90%。

definition: to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
